dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare approach me, foolish mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm not afraid of you, Evil Eye!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words from one who does not understand the depths of fear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek no quarrel, I just wish to pass.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your cowardice sickens me. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will leave, but mark my words, our paths will cross again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I have marked your fate - you will meet your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: As you wish, I shall depart peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Do not return, lest you tempt the wrath of the Evil Eye.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I challenge you, Evil Eye! Face me in combat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a brave fool. Let's see how long you last.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no evil, prepare to be vanquished!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will regret your arrogance, mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I...I take it back, I didn't mean to challenge you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Too late for regrets now. Face your punishment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you a truce, Evil Eye. Let us not be enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A truce? How amusing. You have no power here.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I meant no disrespect. I will go my way in peace.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words mean nothing. Leave before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, if you desire conflict, I shall give it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Conflict is all you will find in these lands. Prepare for battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace, Evil Eye. I seek understanding, not confrontation.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Understanding? You do not belong here, naive wanderer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I only wish to learn from you. Will you share your wisdom with me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom is wasted on feeble minds like yours.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will seek wisdom elsewhere then. Farewell, Evil Eye.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Farewell, ignorant one. May your ignorance be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to leave empty-handed. Prepare for a lesson in respect.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Respect? You will learn fear instead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand your suspicion. I will leave peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Suspicion? No, it is certainty. Leave before you face consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will heed your warning and depart.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Heed it well, for the consequences will be dire if you return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Consequences don't scare me. Let them come.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bravery in ignorance. A fatal flaw. Prepare for the inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm sorry to have disturbed you. I will take my leave now.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Apologies cannot undo what has been done. You have awoken a wrath you cannot comprehend.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I understand. I will leave and trouble you no more.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Troublesome fool. Your departure is wise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to be threatened. Face me if you dare!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Dare? You know not the meaning of the word. Prepare for your punishment.
